name: Stag Barber Co.
measures: You can pre-order a haircut for the future via Stag's [website](http://stagbarberco.com/) and pay now (with free rescheduling and refunds if you need to cancel)
Pay in advance for a cut and be featured on their wall of [Local Heroes](https://www.instagram.com/p/B95ENWgDsxa/)
Some accommodation outside usual hours is possible if you need to re-arrange a cut, rather than cancel
